creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
description: domed cap with wide, long back panel; two long braided black cords on either side of back panel; cap beaded overall with predominately red and orange beads; five turquoise and coral medallions around cap and on crown, each of a different style; cowrie shells around crown; back panel edged in beads carved as skulls, with uncut turquoise stones overall and a large metal and turquoise central medallion; two animal teeth at bottom of back panel--others lost
dimension: 17 x 9 x 11 in. (43.18 x 22.86 x 27.94 cm) (including back panel, without ties)
medium: Beads, cotton, metal, turquoise, bone (?), cowrie shells, animal teeth, coral
title: Headdress
